DOC.brief_summary: Previous study show insulin may stimulate release endothelin ( ET ) endothelial cell . This mechanism may contribute adverse vascular effect determine chronic hyperinsulinemia . The aim study evaluate effect local hyperinsulinemia ET activity forearm circulation . To purpose , assess forearm blood flow response ET receptor antagonism control condition intraarterial infusion insulin . We also measure change plasma ET-1 level response different pharmacological stimulus .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Insulin Endothelin-Dependent Vascular Tone Forearm Circulation
DOC.detailed_description: Previous study show insulin may stimulate release endothelin ( ET ) endothelial cell . This mechanism may contribute adverse vascular effect determine chronic hyperinsulinemia . The aim study evaluate effect local hyperinsulinemia ET activity forearm circulation . To purpose , assess forearm blood flow response ET receptor antagonism control condition intraarterial infusion insulin . We also measure change plasma ET-1 level response different pharmacological stimulus .
DOC.criteria: Between 4065 year old . No medication . No medical problem . No serum cholesterol level 200 mg/dl . No contraceptive .
